TopicTitle: Anyone Want To Join My Space Race In Science Mode

Articles.Content:
I have a space race I am wondering if anyone would like to join? We use real life launch vehicles, I have a discord server and also we put our achievements in the discord server like first kerbal in orbit, first satellite in orbit around Duna, etc...
Here is the discord server link: https://discord.gg/RJgVw9snp8

If you have any questions feel free to ask.
also use mods for making LVs if you would like because usually that is easier.
